info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 3:08PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A THUNDERSTORM WITH INTENSE LIGHTNING WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL CABARRUS...SOUTHEASTERN IREDELL AND SOUTHWESTERN ROWAN COUNTIES UNTIL 345 PM EDT... At 308 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm with intense lightning near Kannapolis, or near Landis, moving northeast at 15 mph. Locations to be impacted include... Kannapolis, Salisbury, Downtown Concord, Mooresville, China Grove, Landis, Enochville, Granite Quarry, Rockwell and Faith. In addition to intense lightning, very heavy rainfall rates up to 2 inches per hour will be possible in these areas.
info.instruction: The combination of gusty winds and saturated soil conditions will cause scattered trees and power lines to fall. Seek shelter inside an interior room. Frequent lightning is occurring with this storm. If outdoors, try to get indoors or into a hard topped vehicle. Otherwise, stay away from open areas and isolated high objects such as trees. When indoors, stay away from windows and doors and avoid using wired electronic devices. Do not take a shower or bath. Try to unplug unnecessary appliances before the storm approaches.
